What is knitr
========================================================

* R package
* Supports Rmarkdown, Latex, HTML as documentation language
* Can export to PDF, HTML

Requirements
================

* recent version of R
* text editor
* some knowledge of markdown, latex, html

What is **knitr** good for
==========================

* manuals
* technical documents
* tutorials
* reports
* data processing documents/summaries

what is not good for
==================

* long research articles
* complex computations
* precise formatting
